channel.title: Lost-realm 718/742!
channel.description:
Hello Guys! First off I would just like to thank you guys for at least opening this thread to look at it. This Server Advertisement is on Lost-Realm 718/742. This Server has some great features that I will list soon, but not only that, a caring community and staff team. We work hard to keep our players satisfied with the game, and we make daily adjustments and updates. On behalf of the staff team and community, we welcome you all who want to join to Lost-Realm 718/742! Here are some features if you are still considering on joining or not.
[color=black]-Various shops, including donator and extreme donator shops![/color] -Squeal of fortune, with rewards like 50 ckeys, 1b, and 2b! Also Lucky Items! -Bones on altar -Friendly staff -Hunter. -All the GodWars Dungeons. [color=limegreen]-Fully working Nex. (Great Drop Rates!)[/color] -Lunars, Ancients, Moderns, Curses, Normal Prayers! -Working Revenants, with great drops! -Queen Black Dragon with unique rewards, such as ckeys, dragon kiteshield, royal crossbow, and more! -Fight Kiln, working 37 waves! -Fight Caves, customized 5 waves! -Many skilling locations. -Working Summoning, with Steel Titan and Pak Yak! -Crystal Chest with unique rewards, Customized Hweens, Spin Tickets, Regular Hweens, and many more cosmetic items! http://gyazo.com/b6f576afc2b46e6c69c140eca119d8a4 -Prestige System, 1-5 and it includes a shop! -Working Construction. -Trimmed comp w/ customization. -Shooting Stars! [color=limegreen]-Crazy Donator Benefits![/color] -Rapid growing community! -Good Drop Rates and Xp Rates! -AND MUCH MUCH, MUCH, MORE!!!!
Client Download- http://uppit.com/n5mppeupjgpd/LostRealmClient.jar
Lost-Realm really does need everyone we can get, I'm not going to lie, but our server has around 10 players every day. We want to exceed that limit, and possibly get anywhere from 20-40. So please, consider joining the server and having a great time here at Lost-Realm 718/742. We welcome you all!! Thanks guys, take care. -Operations. (pm me in-game for any more questions.)

item.title: Lost-realm 718/742!
item.dc:creator: @Operations Operations
item.description:
@Operations wrote:

Hello Guys! First off I would just like to thank you guys for at least opening this thread to look at it. This Server Advertisement is on Lost-Realm 718/742. This Server has some great features that I will list soon, but not only that, a caring community and staff team. We work hard to keep our players satisfied with the game, and we make daily adjustments and updates. On behalf of the staff team and community, we welcome you all who want to join to Lost-Realm 718/742!
Here are some features if you are still considering on joining or not.

[color=black]-Various shops, including donator and extreme donator shops![/color]
-Squeal of fortune, with rewards like 50 ckeys, 1b, and 2b! Also Lucky Items!
-Bones on altar
-Friendly staff
-Hunter.
-All the GodWars Dungeons.
[color=limegreen]-Fully working Nex. (Great Drop Rates!)[/color]
-Lunars, Ancients, Moderns, Curses, Normal Prayers!
-Working Revenants, with great drops!
-Queen Black Dragon with unique rewards, such as ckeys, dragon kiteshield, royal crossbow, and more!
-Fight Kiln, working 37 waves!
-Fight Caves, customized 5 waves!
-Many skilling locations.
-Working Summoning, with Steel Titan and Pak Yak!
-Crystal Chest with unique rewards, Customized Hweens, Spin Tickets, Regular Hweens, and many more cosmetic items! http://gyazo.com/b6f576afc2b46e6c69c140eca119d8a4
-Prestige System, 1-5 and it includes a shop!
-Working Construction.
-Trimmed comp w/ customization.
-Shooting Stars!
[color=limegreen]-Crazy Donator Benefits![/color]
-Rapid growing community!
-Good Drop Rates and Xp Rates!
-AND MUCH MUCH, MUCH, MORE!!!

Client Download- http://uppit.com/n5mppeupjgpd/LostRealmClient.jar

Lost-Realm really does need everyone we can get, Iâ€™m not going to lie, but our server has around 10 players every day. We want to exceed that limit, and possibly get anywhere from 20-40. So please, consider joining the server and having a great time here at Lost-Realm 718/742. We welcome you all!!
Thanks guys, take care.
-Operations. (pm me in-game for any more questions.)
